page.syntax: Text as C = ScanOverSmatch as C(pattern as c)

argument.name: Text
argument.description: The text between the starting and ending offset positions.

argument.name: Find_Text
argument.description: The text that you want to process. You may use the "?" (single character) and "*" (any number of characters) expressions.

page.description: Skip over a pattern . Return text we scanned over.
page.discussion: The <StringScanner>.ScanOverSmatch() function looks for Find_Text at the offset. The offset is positioned immediately after Find_Text.
